knowledge_panel.description: gran turismo is a series of racing simulation video games developed by polyphony digital. developed for playstation systems, gran turismo games are intended to emulate the appearance and performance of a large selection of vehicles, most of which are licensed reproductions of real-world automobiles. wikipedia
